persona: Position 5 graduate tenant commuting late from campus
message: Your late-charging preference suits the later slots well. By focusing on Slot 3 and utilizing the less congested Slot 2 when available (Day 2 and 6), you avoid the sharp carbon spikes present in the early evening. This coordinated approach reduces potential local grid strain at location 5 while cutting your weekly charging carbon exposure by nearly 18% compared to using your least preferred early slots.
